description: Seadrill Ltd. engages in the provision of offshore drilling services to the oil and gas industry. The Company’s primary business is the ownership and operation of drillships, semi-submersible rigs and jack-up rigs for operations in shallow-, mid-, deep-, and ultra-deepwater areas. The company provides a contract-based service and primarily serves the oil super-majors, integrated oil and gas, state-owned national oil, and independent oil and gas companies. As of March 31, 2018, it had a fleet of over 35 offshore drilling units that include 12 semi-submersible rigs, 7 drillships, and 16 jack-up rigs.
name: Seadrill Ltd
